item.title: Windows 11 Tweaks
item.description: Windows 11 Tweaks restore vpn shortcut right click ‘open with’ start menu on left a note on dark & light themes vpn shortcut left click network icon right click background & left click ‘edit quick settings’ click add & select vpn right click ‘open with’ open regedit navigate to: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\CLASSES\CLSID\ create new key named (and include {}): {86ca1aa0-34aa-4e8b-a509-50c905bae2a2} under {86ca1aa0-34aa-4e8b-a509-50c905bae2a2}; create a new key called: InprocServer32 with empty/blank value close & reboot kudos: https://www.
